'''''Angle Eraser''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To obtain this achievement, the player needs to complete all [[Beastly Rift]] challenges in [[Beryl Region]], [[Fontaine]].

==Trivia==
*The achievement's name is a reference to the 1929 short horror story {{W|Hounds of Tindalos|The Hounds of Tindalos}}, later adopted by the {{W|Cthulhu Mythos}}. Like [[Riftwolf|Riftwolves]], the titular hounds are eldritch interdimensional predators that can enter our reality to hunt. In their case, by using geometric angles in a structure as portals. Ergo, sealing the rifts to deny the riftwolves entry is akin to "erasing the angles".
